QueryToExecute:
select
  id as resource,
  case
    when enable_termination_protection then 'ok'
    else 'alarm'
  end as status,
  case
    when enable_termination_protection then title || ' termination protection enabled.'
    else title || ' termination protection disabled.'
  end as reason
  
  , region, account_id
from
  aws_cloudformation_stack;
